FileHelper::copyDirectory.description: Copies a whole directory as another one.

FileHelper::filterPath.description: Checks if the given file path satisfies the filtering options.

FileHelper::findFiles.description: Returns the files found under the specified directory and subdirectories.

FileHelper::getExtensionsByMimeType.description: Determines the extensions by given MIME type.

FileHelper::getMimeType.description: Determines the MIME type of the specified file.

FileHelper::getMimeTypeByExtension.description: Determines the MIME type based on the extension name of the specified file.

FileHelper::loadMimeTypes.description: Loads MIME types from the specified file.

FileHelper::localize.description: Returns the localized version of a specified file.

FileHelper::removeDirectory.description: Removes a directory (and all its content) recursively.
